summary: Produced by Steven Spielberg and presented by Tom Hanks this documentary tells how war photographers faced the horrors that looked both in Europe and in the Pacific during World War II .
cast: Tom Hanks|Stephen Ambrose|Russ Meyer|Walter Rosenblum|Joseph Longo|Doug Wood|Arthur Mainzer|Doug Morrell|Fred Bornet|Harold Kempe|Daniel A. McGovern|Norm Hatch|Johnathan Ercole|Edward Montagne|David L. Quaid|Richard Brooks|Carl Voelker|Reuben Weiner|Samuel A. Sorenson|Jim Bates|Melvyn R. Paisley|Don Honeyman|Lloyd Durant|Jerry Anker|James Doolittle|John Ford|George Gay|William F. Halsey|Benito Mussolini|Clara Petacci|Holland M. Smith
title: Rodando la guerra
